## Introduction

Land cover classification is a commonly used application area of digital image analysis.

## Motivations

The government have decided to merge 14 primary schools, six secondary schools, and eight junior colleges in 2019.

This is because:

-   Declining birth rates resulted in a decline in students entering post-secondary institutions

-   Low enrollment creates challenges to offer a wide range of subject combinations, educational programmes and co-curricular activities (CCAs).

-   Increase interest to attend polytechnics instead of junior college.
